title: Multiply two numbers description: Write a programme to multiply two numbers image: hero.png tags:

  • python
  • c contributors:
  • Shahzeb-A
  • ClasherKasten

Write a programme to multiply two numbers

Input:  5 4
Output: 20

# input first number
a = int(input('Write the first number'))

# input second number
b = int(input('Write the second number'))

# output
print('The output is ', a*b)

#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
    int a, b;
    printf("Enter two numbers : ");
    scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);

    int product = a * b;

    printf("\n%d * %d = %d\n", a, b, product);
    return 0;
}

// Write a programme to multiply two numbers

#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
    int a, b;
    printf("Enter two numbers : ");
    scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);

    int product = a * b;

    printf("\n%d * %d = %d\n", a, b, product);
    return 0;
}


# Write a programme to multiply two numbers
print('Welcome')
a = int(input('Write the first number : '))
b = int(input('Write the second number : '))
print('The output is ', a*b)
